CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(StageName, '1 - Planning'), 'Planlegging', IF( AND(Meeting_Booked__c = TRUE , OR(TEXT(StageName)='2 - RFI', TEXT(StageName)='3 - Prequal', AND(TEXT(StageName)='4 - Order',TEXT(Status__c)='In Progress'))), 'Pågår, møte planlagt', IF( AND(TEXT(StageName)='4 - Order',TEXT(Status__c)='Sent'), 'Venter på tilbakemelding', IF(OR(TEXT(StageName)='Awarded', TEXT(StageName)='Closed Won',TEXT(StageName)='Closed Lost', TEXT(StageName)='Abandoned by Us',TEXT(StageName)='Abandoned by Customer'), 'Avsluttet', '' ))))
CustomField.label: xxxApps status2
